item.title: Satellite Geodesy: Surveying the Earth from Orbit
item.description: Version notes ucl_sc_geodesy_v07.html - UCL Science Centre Lecture Series, Summer 2019, London, UK WebGL presentation slides. Runs on deck.js. Use the “m” key to open the menu for quick navigation between slides. As a template, the presentation uses the slide deck from David Lyon’s ‘Intro to WebGL with Three.js’ (Slides | Video).

item.title: The Vulnerabilities of GNSS to Space Weather
